title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Integrated Clinical Reasoning Development in Dental Science: Case-Based Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dental knowledge, understanding of clinical procedures, patient record analysis ability
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can extract key information for diagnosis and treatment planning in complex dental cases with over 80% accuracy
Learners can present three or more appropriate treatment options prioritized in given clinical scenarios
Learners can revise and submit their treatment plans at least once, incorporating peer feedback, before final submission.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
